dict.acceptation: 锁；水闸，船闸；（机器部件等的）锁定；一把，一撮；
锁上；锁好，关好；使固定；隐藏；
卡住，不动；纠结；僵硬不动；

sent.orig: Mechanical Combination Lock, Door Lock, Car Lock, Window Door Lock, Cabinet Lock.
sent.trans: 采购产品机械组合锁，门锁，汽车锁，窗门锁，锁内阁。

sent.orig: Electrical life: 50000Primary Characteristic current single velocity switch, which have self-lock, no self-lock, or lock device.
sent.trans: 电器寿命：50000主要特征：交流单速开关，带自锁无自锁或反锁。

sent.orig: Adopt in furniture such as drawer lock cabinet lock, window locklock and postbox lock etc.
sent.trans: 适用于家具上使用的锁，如抽屉锁、橱窗锁、箱包锁、邮箱锁等。

sent.orig: The lock type flat lock and cross-lock.
sent.trans: 锁线形式有平锁和交叉锁两种。

sent.orig: The alarm security door lock is the combination of the mechanical lock and electric lock.
sent.trans: 警钟安全门锁，是结合了机械锁和电锁。
